title: U.S. Treasury extends comment period on proposed crypto regulations due to “strong public interest”
description: In response to significant public engagement, the U.S. Treasury has decided to extend the comment period for its proposed cryptocurrency reporting rules. Initially unveiled in late August, the proposed rules have generated a considerable amount of public interest, compelling the agency to give people more time to voice their thoughts. According to a Federal Register ... Read more

title: Ripple Partners With Uphold to Boost Crypto Liquidity Infrastructure
description:
Blockchain payments firm Ripple has partnered with web3 financial platform Uphold to access greater cryptocurrency liquidity for its global payments infrastructure. The collaboration aims to strengthen Ripple’s existing cross-border payment solutions by leveraging Uphold’s links to over 30 trading venues. This will enable seamless crypto-to-fiat transfers and bank payouts. Ripple utilizes digital assets to provide […]

The post Ripple Partners With Uphold to Boost Crypto Liquidity Infrastructure appeared first on Coin Edition.
